body.p:
You can use one of the Translate ... actions from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Translate category to ask the AI Positron to translate the contents of a DITA XML topic to a certain language.
The translation actions attempt to preserve unchanged the XML structure, inline elements and avoid translating DITA XML elements like codeblock and codeph.

The Translate AI action is incredibly useful to end users as it provides a quick and efficient solution for language barriers. With this action, users can easily translate text or speech from one language to another, enabling effective communication and understanding across different cultures and languages. The "Translate" AI action saves time, eliminates misunderstandings, and enhances global communication, making it an indispensable tool for anyone in need of seamless language translation.
Open the topic and invoke one of the Translate... actions.
